services.name: Electrical Repair
services.shortDescription: Expert diagnosis and repair for all electrical issues.
services.longDescription: Flickering lights? Tripping breakers? Dead outlets? Bright Spark Electric diagnoses and repairs all electrical problems safely and correctly. Our licensed electricians identify the root cause and fix it right the first time, ensuring your home's electrical system is safe and reliable.

services.name: Panel Upgrade
services.shortDescription: Upgrade your electrical panel for more power and safety.
services.longDescription: Older homes often have electrical panels that can't handle modern demands. Bright Spark Electric upgrades panels from 100 to 200 amps or more, adding capacity for modern appliances, EV chargers, and home additions. All work is permitted and inspected.

services.name: Outlet & Switch Installation
services.shortDescription: Install, repair, or upgrade outlets and switches.
services.longDescription: Need more outlets? Want USB charging ports? Upgrading to smart switches? Bright Spark Electric installs all types of outlets and switches, from standard to GFCI, AFCI, and smart devices. We ensure proper placement, secure connections, and code compliance.

services.name: Lighting Installation
services.shortDescription: Indoor, outdoor, and specialty lighting solutions.
services.longDescription: Transform your space with professional lighting installation from Bright Spark Electric. We install recessed lighting, chandeliers, under-cabinet lights, landscape lighting, and more. Our electricians ensure safe installation and help you choose the right fixtures for your needs.

services.name: Ceiling Fan Installation
services.shortDescription: Professional ceiling fan installation and repair.
services.longDescription: A properly installed ceiling fan improves comfort and saves energy. Bright Spark Electric installs all types of ceiling fans, from simple to smart-enabled. We ensure secure mounting, proper wiring, and balanced operation.

services.name: EV Charger Installation
services.shortDescription: Install a Level 2 EV charger at your home.
services.longDescription: Charge your electric vehicle at home with a Level 2 charger installation from Bright Spark Electric. We install all major brands including Tesla, ChargePoint, and JuiceBox. Our licensed electricians ensure proper circuit sizing, permitting, and safe installation.

services.name: Whole-Home Rewiring
services.shortDescription: Replace outdated wiring with safe, modern electrical.
services.longDescription: Older homes with knob-and-tube or aluminum wiring pose serious safety risks. Bright Spark Electric replaces outdated wiring with modern copper wiring that meets current codes. We minimize disruption while ensuring your home is safe for decades to come.
